cards.name: Ajani, Strength of the Pride
cards.text:
[+1]: You gain life equal to the number of creatures you control plus the number of planeswalkers you control.
[−2]: Create a 2/2 white Cat Soldier creature token named Ajani's Pridemate with "Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate."
[0]: If you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, exile Ajani, Strength of the Pride and each artifact and creature your opponents control.

cards.flavor: As demons are drawn to suffering, angels are drawn to acts of benevolence.
cards.name: Angelic Accord
cards.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: Her presence on the battlefield can transform an unruly mob into a disciplined army.
cards.name: Angelic Field Marshal
cards.text:
Flying
Lieutenant - As long as you control your commander, Angelic Field Marshal gets +2/+2 and creatures you control have vigilance.

cards.name: Angel of Destiny
cards.text:
Flying, double strike
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you and that player each gain that much life.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, each player Angel of Destiny attacked this turn loses the game.

cards.name: Angel of Serenity
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Angel of Vitality
cards.text:
Flying
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Angel of Vitality gets +2/+2 as long as you have 25 or more life.

cards.name: Archangel of Tithes
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Archangel of Tithes is untapped, creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.
As long as Archangel of Tithes is attacking, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

cards.name: Austere Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

cards.flavor: "Within every angel is a spirit of light that will fight as long as there is darkness."
cards.name: Bishop of Wings
cards.text:
Whenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 4 life.
Whenever an Angel you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: The Book of Exalted Deeds
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.
{W}{W}{W}, {T}, Exile The Book of Exalted Deeds: Put an enlightened counter on target Angel. It gains "You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game." Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.
cards.name: Cleansing Nova
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

cards.flavor:
"To wage war, secure peace within yourself."
-Emmara
cards.name: Dawn of Hope
cards.text:
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

cards.name: Dismantling Wave
cards.text:
For each opponent, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment that player controls.
Cycling {6}{W}{W} ({6}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Dismantling Wave, destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

cards.name: Emeria Shepherd
cards.text:
Flying
Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target nonland permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If that land is a Plains, you may return that nonland permanent card to the battlefield instead.

cards.name: Entreat the Angels
cards.text:
Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.
Miracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.flavor: The source of the Cabaretti's Halo turned out to be a single teenage girl.
cards.name: Giada, Font of Hope
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Each other Angel you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it for each Angel you already control.
{T}: Add {W}. Spend this mana only to cast an Angel spell.

cards.flavor: When griffins started nesting atop the northern tower, the castellan worried they'd be a nuisance. Instead, they took the entire castle under their protection.
cards.name: Griffin Aerie
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

cards.flavor:
"Let go of all that harms you. Cast your burdens into the darkness, and build for the faithful a house of light."
-Song of All, canto 1008
cards.name: Invoke the Divine
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

cards.name: Keeper of the Accord
cards.text:
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player controls more creatures than you, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Kindred Boon
cards.text:
As Kindred Boon enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{1}{W}: Put a divinity counter on target creature you control of the chosen type.
Each creature you control with a divinity counter on it has indestructible.

cards.flavor: Though Heliod turned against humanity in his hunger for power, the ideals he once championed still stand strong.
cards.name: Nykthos Paragon
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Do this only once each turn.

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Righteous Valkyrie
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another Angel or Cleric enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
As long as you have at least 7 life more than your starting life total, creatures you control get +2/+2.

cards.name: Search for Glory
cards.text: Search your library for a snow permanent card, a legendary card, or a Saga card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 1 life for each {S} spent to cast this spell. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

cards.name: Sephara, Sky's Blade
cards.text:
You may pay {W} and tap four untapped creatures you control with flying rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Flying, lifelink
Other creatures you control with flying have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

cards.name: Serra Ascendant
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
As long as you have 30 or more life, Serra Ascendant gets +5/+5 and has flying.

cards.flavor: She preaches the blessings of the Machine Orthodoxy.
cards.name: Shattered Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: "All are welcome in the angels' light."
cards.name: Speaker of the Heavens
cards.text:
Vigilance, lifelink
{T}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate only if you have at least 7 life more than your starting life total and only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: "I do not fear death. I know my soul will rise to Starnheim, where I will feast forever among valkyries and heroes. Can you say the same?"
cards.name: Starnheim Aspirant
cards.text: Angel spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

cards.flavor: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.
cards.name: Sunblast Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

cards.flavor: "The arc of my blade has carved a path of light for the peace that will follow."
cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.flavor: "Let the points of our lances lead the way."
cards.name: Thalia's Lancers
cards.text:
First strike
When Thalia's Lancers enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a legendary card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.
cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor: The Skoti owe their immortality to the elixir, and the manner of its creation is their most closely guarded secret.
cards.name: Cosmos Elixir
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if your life total is greater than your starting life total. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: Guarded by cartographers, disdained by warlords, coveted by adventurers.
cards.name: Endless Atlas
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you control three or more lands with the same name.

cards.name: Everflowing Chalice
cards.text:
Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.
{T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

cards.name: Heirloom Blade
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+1.
Whenever equipped creature dies, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card that shares a creature type with it. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Equip {1}

cards.flavor: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.
cards.name: Lightning Greaves
cards.text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}

cards.name: Marble Diamond
cards.text:
Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.

cards.name: Mazemind Tome
cards.text:
{T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Scry 1.
{2}, {T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Draw a card.
When there are four or more page counters on Mazemind Tome, exile it. If you do, you gain 4 life.

cards.name: Mind Stone
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"The worthy shall respect the worthy. In the afterlife, all will stand united."
-Monument inscription
cards.name: Oketra's Monument
cards.text:
White creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.

cards.name: Pearl Medallion
cards.text: White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.flavor: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.
cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.name: Swiftfoot Boots
cards.text:
Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Equip {1}

cards.flavor: The blade glows only for Zendikar's chosen.
cards.name: Sword of the Animist
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Equip {2}

cards.name: Tome of Legends
cards.text:
Tome of Legends enters the battlefield with a page counter on it.
Whenever your commander enters the battlefield or attacks, put a page counter on Tome of Legends.
{1}, {T}, Remove a page counter from Tome of Legends: Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Stop thinking like an artificer, Urza, and start thinking like a father!"
-Rayne, chancellor of the Tolarian Academy
cards.name: Urza's Incubator
cards.text:
As Urza's Incubator enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creature spells of the chosen type cost {2} less to cast.

cards.name: Vanquisher's Banner
cards.text:
As Vanquisher's Banner enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Some say the knowledge lost during the Ritual of Rebuking is returned through the well's waters.
cards.name: Well of Lost Dreams
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

cards.name: Arch of Orazca
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor: There is a sanctuary that reveals itself only to those graced by the eludha-the mystical connection between bonder and monster.
cards.name: Bonders' Enclave
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.name: Emeria, the Sky Ruin
cards.text:
Emeria, the Sky Ruin enters the battlefield tapped.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more Plains, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{T}: Add {W}.

cards.name: Karoo
cards.text:
Karoo enters the battlefield tapped.
When Karoo enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Plains you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {C}{W}.

cards.name: Myriad Landscape
cards.text:
Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Choose a color. Add an amount of mana of that color equal to your devotion to that color. (Your devotion to a color is the number of mana symbols of that color in the mana costs of permanents you control.)

cards.name: Path of Ancestry
cards.text:
Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Seraph Sanctuary
cards.text:
When Seraph Sanctuary enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
Whenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.

cards.flavor: A figure is moved on a map, and the tide of war changes.
cards.name: War Room
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}, Pay life equal to the number of colors in your commanders' color identity: Draw a card.

expansion.name_gatherer: Angels: They're Just Like Us but Cooler and with Wings
